1213250.name: Wagrrr
1213250.description:
Wagrrr is a game and broadcast tool for online game streamers and broadcasters.
Viewers interact with your stream with fun abilities and wager on your Battle Royale game progress. To win with you when you WIN!

Let Wagrrr add an extra layer of FUN and INTERACTIVITY to your online broadcasts!
Allow your viewers to show their reactions to your broadcast and gameplay with live on-screen emotes.
Viewers can also send text messages directly to your screen through a message panel that uses the same offensive word filter as Google.
Viewers can ask each other yes/no and multiple-choice questions on the screen while you play! Wagrrr gathers answers, tallies and displays results!
Hosts(you) can also ask questions in real-time and get graphical responses and results with Wagrrr's easy question control systems!

Wagrrr is also a game!
Viewers use in-game economy called "treats" to make fun wagers on your gameplay and win more "treats" when you win!!!
They can then spend those treats on the actions above.

Wagrrr is HIGHLY customizable. Only show what you want on the screen, where you want it, and for how long you want it.
Easily ban offensive Viewers misusing your message systems.
Easy to setup and install in your favorite broadcasting software such as OBS (Open Broadcast Software).
Wagrrr currently supports all popular Battle Royale type games AND support for other game types such as MOBA'S and Sports games planned to be added after official release.
